channel.title: Micro Manage not working properly
channel.description: If I try to change the size of a statue it's not working. I cannot select them I can change size direction etc.. for any modules but not for the statues... Any idea??

item.title: Micro Manage not working properly
item.dc:creator: @KayOssOfficial Kay Oss Official
item.description:
@KayOssOfficial wrote:

because the vanilla statues works like an item, you place the from your hand slot and not with your build gun… download the big statues mod, i think you are able to resize them

Read full topic
